Thou Goethe
Thou Doest
Lay in my heart
And I will call on them.
Another day in August,
I will call on them.
And I will pray that all of you
will come and see me.
But I will pray that all of you
will come and see me.
And I will pray that all of you
will come and see me.
And I will pray that all of you
will come and see me.
That Mary, I love you, the Lord,
see all what one must want.
In all the love that I could be,
I will pray that all of you
will come and see me.
